attributes.additional_details:
Housing:
The price of an average home is up to 500k and renting is up to 600 a month for just a studio flat!

http://zo.op.la/ejskx2

Travel:
To travel outside a London borough, it Can cost you up to £407 just for a season ticket between Guildford and London! Yet alone the standard of travel has gone downhill with more delays and cancellations!

This is not acceptable and needs to stop!
attributes.background: Stop building unaffordable housing, introduce a price cap on rent and buying and make travel cheaper for ordinary Londoners who work round the clock to keep the city running!

rejection.details:
The petition has been rejected because it not clear exactly what action you want the Government and/or Parliament to take. 

You could create a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action which we may be able to approve. However, depending on the action you believe should be taken it may be more appropriate to petition the London Assembly if it is about something that it the responsibility of the Greater London Authority. You can find the petition site for the London Assembly here: 

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
